markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spider Root](/Equipment.aspx?ID=129)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Contact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=37" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 110 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A paste made by mashing the fine, threadlike roots of a certain creeper vine, spider root renders a victim clumsy and maladroit.

**Saving Throw** DC 28 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 minute; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 8d6 poison damage and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 minute); **Stage 2** 9d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 minute); **Stage 3** 10d6 poison damage and clumsy 3 (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spider Root
